name: Equivalent Exchange (Aurora)
description:
You lose consciousness after hanging. When you wake up in your home, you find out you aren't familiar with the house anymore.

To escape the room and find out what happens after hanging, you must observe carefully and collect items to solve puzzles. However, it seems you have more than a way to leave...

- Game design, coding, music, and texts  by Aurora
- Game assets(Artwork and video) by 37R
- Sound effects from Unity Asset Store and Aigei.com
